root.name: Creavures
root.description: OverviewCreavures takes place in a magical forest where the player will take control of five different Creavures, which are small mythical creatures. Each of these possess a unique ability. You must travel deep into the dying forest with your Creavures, using their abilities to gather "essence" and to restore the light in the forest.
